field.label: Enabled
field.help: This will enable or disable the server config.

field.label: Name
field.help: Set the name for this instance.

field.label: Instance
field.help: Set the instance number needed for interface calculation. It has to be unique for each instance.

field.label: Public Key
field.help: Public key of this instance. After saving this field is automatically and you can give out the key to other parties.

field.label: Private Key
field.help: Private key of this instance. Please keep it save.

field.label: Listen Port
field.help: Set port for this instance to listen to.

field.label: Tunnel Address
field.help: List of addresses to configure on the tunnel adapter. Please use CIDR notation like 10.0.0.1/24.

field.label: Peers
field.help: List of peers for this server.
